about_the_game:
My Lord is Hiring lets players take the reign as a hiring manager in a dying kingdom, as its last hope the duty of finding help to keep it well-defended. Managing your income and the workers that give it to you, as well as warriors that defend against the creatures of corrupted gods.

Leading a kingdom to greatness does not come easily, hundreds of soldiers and workers looking for work and the ability to show off their skills, and the only way to reasonably recruit so many people in a kingdom with more open spaces than it can handle is through the age-old method that has been used since the times before history has even been recorded.

Job applications and resumes.

Management skills intertwine with one's ability to judge the worth of applicants while trying to remember even Lords have budgets.

How long can players last, fending off the underworld hordes, and managing their own money while paying all of their workers and fighters?

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: A job interview simulator sets in fantasy world. Hire, reject, and fire people while trying to maintain your economy. Train and gear up your units to defend your town from invading monsters. Deploy your troops across the regions to complete your missions and unite the kingdoms.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
